评论概述: So cute! Perfect belt bag for tweens!

评论概述: Adorable Cross Body Bag For Girls!
评论详情: My wife tasked me with hunting down a crossbody bag for our 8 year old niece on Vine, and found this one. It is very well made, and the initial on the front is super cute. It reminds me of a varsity letter from back in high school, except way more sparkly!  The bag has an adjustable strap and our niece absolutely loves it! She looks just like her aunt with her crossbody bag.  This is a perfect bag for a little girl who loves purple and pink!
